headline: Is Mondelez (MDLZ) Trading Off Profit Margins for Growth With Its Updated 2025 Outlook?
summary: Mondelez International recently reported its third-quarter 2025 earnings, citing US$9.74 billion in sales, but with net income declining to US$743 million from US$853 million in the previous year; the company also updated its guidance to forecast organic net revenue growth above 4% for the full year and continued share buybacks. While sales increased, the fall in net income alongside a reaffirmed growth outlook and ongoing share repurchases highlights the company's balancing act between...
